CREATE TABLE "users" (
  "id" NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY,
  "photo_url" VARCHAR2(200 CHAR),
  CONSTRAINT users_pk PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);

CREATE TABLE "user_passwords" (
  "id" NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY,
  "user_id" VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  "username" VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  "user_password" VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT user_passwords_pk PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);

CREATE TABLE "books" (
  "id" NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY,
  "name" VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  "author" VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  "publisher" VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  "date_published" DATE NOT NULL,
  "details" VARCHAR2(3000 CHAR),
  "cover_url" VARCHAR2(200 CHAR),
  CONSTRAINT books_pk PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);

CREATE TABLE "actions" (
  "id" NUMBER GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY,
  "book_id" NUMBER NOT NULL,
  "user_id" NUMBER,
  "action" VARCHAR2(45 CHAR) NOT NULL,
  "date" DATE NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT actions_pk PRIMARY KEY ("id")
);
